# @esdmr/assert/errors package
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/errors](./esdmr.assert.errors.md)


## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AssertionError](./esdmr.assert.errors.assertionerror.md) | The error which is thrown by the <code>assert</code> function. |
|  [PrimitiveError](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror.md) | Wrapper for any thrown value which is not an instance of Error. It converts those values to string via <code>String</code>. |
|  [WrappedError](./esdmr.assert.errors.wrappederror.md) | Wrapper for any thrown value. It provides extra context to errors and assertions. Internally it uses [PrimitiveError](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror.md) to wrap the original thrown value. |
